Selling and supporting AgencyManager (formerly called "WinModel"), the ONLY complete management and accounting software solution for agencies representing Models, Talent, and Artists. Also provide world-class booking systems, with a seamless Booking LINK ("BLINK") in/out of our agency management/accounting suite.AgencyManager is the foundation of agency operations and financials, integrating with your booking system, as well as connecting via General Ledger Update-Export ("GLUE") to numerous accounting systems (G/L+banking), either on-premise (local), hosted/SaaS (cloud) or hybrid.

We are creative/design and digital agency, business/technology solution providers, social visionaries, trusted  advisers and consultants. We listen, prove it, and add ongoing value to our clients'​ operations. We advise, extend, enhance, optimize and connect your business to the outside world, to nurture and promote profitable growth.

Provider of visionary business solutions from 2006--2016. Specialized in ERP/accounting & analytics software -- SaaS/cross-platform -- for fashion/apparel, model-talent-artist agencies, and POS/retail management. Services: implementation, custom development, integration, training and support, plus a full range of web/social-media content, design, and creative services:[concept--​>content--​>deliver--​>manage--​>maintain--​>optimize-->evolve]

Yourcegid Retail is a cloud-based retail management solution that integrates a broad range of functionality -- including POS and store operations, inventory management, merchandising, mobility, CRM, clienteling, loyalty, omnichannnel / multi-channel, reporting and analytics -- into a single platform. The real time, feature-rich solution enables you to enhance the customer experience, optimize operational efficiency, and ensure ongoing profitable growth.

Micro DataNet or is a consulting and technology company, providing business software (ERP+CRM), e-commerce (B2B+B2C), and cloud solutions.Specializations & Vertical Solutions:1) ERP/Accounting, 2) Distribution, Wholesale, WMS & EDI, 3) Manufacturing (discrete/process), Supply Chain & Logistics, 4) Pharma & Biotech, 5) e-Commerce, eTail & Retail (web shop, click-and-brick, cloud POS).Best-of-Breed Solutions & Integrations: Microsoft Dynamics NAV (formerly Navision), INTACCT (cloud financials), Concur (cloud expense mgmt.), Salesforce (CRM) and Magento (web shop).

We had an extremely disappointing experience with an IT group that actually made us question the viability of the software and our entire approach.  We were referred to DreamIT and Russ and began to recognize immediate improvements in the application through repair of bad development (code), information and training, and enhancements from Russ and his group that not only had invaluable understanding of the functional applications of the product we were using, but quickly learned our requirements and how our business needed to be supported.  We have just completed an upgrade, forming a base for further enhancements and efficiencies from Russ & his group.  Russ & DreamIT were able to help us stabilize poorly designed customized modifications to a broad-based system and more us forward.  Thanks again Russ.

summary: SKILLS: Devising clever solutions to ordinary and extraordinary business problems.  Listening (with understanding), anticipating needs & enabling high-growth for clients. Developing business to drive revenue.  PROVIDE: Visionary business solutions -- Accounting, Booking, Management, ERP, CRM, IT, POS / Retail, eCommerce, and Social Media / Marketing -- complemented by insightful, intuitive consulting services.FOCUS: Model / Talent / Artist Agencies (Booking, Accounting & Management), POS / Retail Management (stores, omnichannel, mobility and OMS) for Specialty Retailers, and Fashion / Apparel ERP (accounting, distribution, wholesale, manufacturing, import / export). KEYWORDS: Enterprise Software Sales / Sales Operations / Leading Enterprise / Services Sales
